body_html:
Hi, thanks for reponse.

Looks like the tool/lib being used in build are specified by the option to invokde cmake, -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release or -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug.

When -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release (or Debug) is used, the generated projects can only used to build that type. Ideally, the projects should be able to build both Debug and Release build.

body:
Hi, thanks for reponse.

Looks like the tool/lib being used in build are specified by the option to invokde cmake, -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release or -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug.

When -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release (or Debug) is used, the generated projects can only used to build that type. Ideally, the projects should be able to build both Debug and Release build.
